title: ACID BATH Announces Their First 2026 Show Feat. OBITUARY
description: The bath rolls on! The post ACID BATH Announces Their First 2026 Show Feat. OBITUARY appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
text: Sludge metal pioneering band Acid Bath is officially extending their long-awaited live return into 2026, with a newly announced show scheduled for March 21 at The Caverns in Grundy County, Tennessee. This marks the latest in a string of reunion performances following the band's first return to the stage in nearly 30 years this past April. Their newly announced 2026 performance will take place at the renowned underground venue The Caverns, located in Grundy County, TN – famous for hosting concerts in its natural cave setting – alongside openers Obituary, Herakleion, and Saint Avangeline. Check that out alongside every other tour date Acid Bath currently has lined up for 2025 (and now 2026). 7/11 Brooklyn, NY Brooklyn Paramount (w/ Eyehategod & Wailin Storms)7/18–20 Mansfield, OH Inkcarceration Music & Tattoo Festival7/25 Brooklyn, NY Brooklyn Paramount (w/ Pentagram)8/9 Minneapolis, MN The Fillmore (w/ Windhand & Primitive Man)8/16 Baltimore, MD Power Plant Live (w/ High On Fire, Windhand, Heavy Temple & Sonja)8/22 Los Angeles, CA Hollywood Palladium (w/ High On Fire & Windhand)8/28 Los Angeles, CA Hollywood Palladium (w/ Pig Destroyer & The Obsessed)9/9 Austin, TX Levitation9/18–21 Louisville, KY Louder Than Life10/2 Sacramento, CA Discovery Park (Aftershock Festival)10/11 Toronto, ON Rebel (w/ Voivod)12/5–6 Denver, CO Fillmore Auditorium (Decibel Magazine Metal & Beer Fest: Denver)12/12 Chicago, IL Salt Shed (w/ High On Fire & Weedeater)3/21 Grundy County, TN The Caverns (w/ Obituary, Herakleion & Saint Avangeline) Want More Metal? html:
Sludge metal pioneering band Acid Bath is officially extending their long-awaited live return into 2026, with a newly announced show scheduled for March 21 at The Caverns in Grundy County, Tennessee. This marks the latest in a string of reunion performances following the band's first return to the stage in nearly 30 years this past April.

Their newly announced 2026 performance will take place at the renowned underground venue The Caverns, located in Grundy County, TN – famous for hosting concerts in its natural cave setting – alongside openers Obituary, Herakleion, and Saint Avangeline. Check that out alongside every other tour date Acid Bath currently has lined up for 2025 (and now 2026).

7/11 Brooklyn, NY Brooklyn Paramount (w/ Eyehategod & Wailin Storms)
7/18–20 Mansfield, OH Inkcarceration Music & Tattoo Festival
7/25 Brooklyn, NY Brooklyn Paramount (w/ Pentagram)
8/9 Minneapolis, MN The Fillmore (w/ Windhand & Primitive Man)
8/16 Baltimore, MD Power Plant Live (w/ High On Fire, Windhand, Heavy Temple & Sonja)
8/22 Los Angeles, CA Hollywood Palladium (w/ High On Fire & Windhand)
8/28 Los Angeles, CA Hollywood Palladium (w/ Pig Destroyer & The Obsessed)
9/9 Austin, TX Levitation
9/18–21 Louisville, KY Louder Than Life
10/2 Sacramento, CA Discovery Park (Aftershock Festival)
10/11 Toronto, ON Rebel (w/ Voivod)
12/5–6 Denver, CO Fillmore Auditorium (Decibel Magazine Metal & Beer Fest: Denver)
12/12 Chicago, IL Salt Shed (w/ High On Fire & Weedeater)
3/21 Grundy County, TN The Caverns (w/ Obituary, Herakleion & Saint Avangeline)
